title: Pixel 2 handset freezes continuously. Ample Space, apps updated. Can't pick up the calls. What to do
content:
I have google pixel 2 that freezes or won't respond. Freezes continuously. Factory reset has been done but no luck. Can not pick up the calls as well. Ample space is available in handset. All apps are updated.

Tried by removing some of the apps but no luck. It is very frustrating. Don't understand how to resolve this freezing issue. Plz help.
